WRITING.TITLE: Exalting Dragons
WRITING.TEXT: Hey!I am playing FlightRising for nearly 1 month so i am kind of a baby:3As i see in forums people are mostly against exalting dragons.I wonder if exalting dragons is a bad thing.I have never exalted a dragon till now.I did some research and after,i do not think it is a bad thing unless you don't cross the line,and like do not exalt all of your dragons.Please let me know. My FR account:[https://flightrising.com/main.php?p=lair amp;tab=userpage amp;id=544570](https://flightrising.com/main.php?p=lair amp;tab=userpage amp;id=544570) Stay safe,Take care lt;33. (HEYY!I read the replies and thanks they really helped me)

WRITING.TITLE: Predict Morphology
WRITING.TEXT: Hey!I play FR for a really small time and i recently found out predict morphology thingy.I cannot find much informtion in wiki.I wonder if it has another thing other then preview what will dragon you created looks like.Cause i see a lot of posts in pinterest under the tag predict morphology. My flight rising account:[https://flightrising.com/main.php?p=lair amp;tab=userpage amp;id=544570](https://flightrising.com/main.php?p=lair amp;tab=userpage amp;id=544570) Stay safe,Take care lt;33.
Thank you very much.Thats really helpful.

WRITING.TITLE: Selling Dragons
WRITING.TEXT: Hey!I am gonna be starting my own xmas themed dragon breeding project for myself,so i need some money and some space on my lair:(.So i need to sell some of my dragons.If you are interested in buying them,you can contact me via my FlightRising account(i am gonna be leaving the link down).But i do not really want them to buy you just for exalting i want to give them a good home.So im gonna be leaving their pictures down so you can look at them.If you want to take a closer look,i will link them below their pictures,you can also see them in my lair gt;sale tab.You can learn their price info from their bios. Contact me via my FlightRising account:[https://flightrising.com/main.php?p=lair amp;tab=userpage amp;id=544570](https://flightrising.com/main.php?p=lair amp;tab=userpage amp;id=544570) Stay safe,take #8203; [ #8609;](https://preview.redd.it/y62nhbxouxq51.png?width=350 amp;format=png amp;auto=webp amp;s=a9eac5c327580ceb04b8e1ec30a85f099229fb5b) [https://www1.flightrising.com/dragon/63866933](https://www1.flightrising.com/dragon/63866933) #8203; [ #8609;](https://preview.redd.it/eyjo2yk0vxq51.png?width=350 amp;format=png amp;auto=webp amp;s=fc99a35c7cdcccc1cb9842662b1feb0612d2fced) [https://www1.flightrising.com/dragon/63811324](https://www1.flightrising.com/dragon/63811324) #8203; [ #8609;](https://preview.redd.it/ub13x1x3vxq51.png?width=350 amp;format=png amp;auto=webp amp;s=d3b7a5badc56e8995b68ab56429488f2a7c86f77) [https://www1.flightrising.com/dragon/63963980](https://www1.flightrising.com/dragon/63963980) [ #8609;](https://preview.redd.it/efgmtwu6vxq51.png?width=350 amp;format=png amp;auto=webp amp;s=05aa5bc56e7c939a8db5cf2dd20d521c6e52d9e0) [https://www1.flightrising.com/dragon/64239752](https://www1.flightrising.com/dragon/64239752) [ #8609;](https://preview.redd.it/bzt5kmj8vxq51.png?width=350 amp;format=png amp;auto=webp amp;s=7755eb764fb1c28088694cb50ee9a57f90c4c752) [https://www1.flightrising.com/dragon/63963979](https://www1.flightrising.com/dragon/63963979)
I sadly do not have a dragon born today,I just wanted to say happy birthday.I hope that you will be happy all your life lt;333

WRITING.TITLE: Stickers!
WRITING.TEXT: Hello!I had some free time and i did some sticker of ice clan(also my clan)in different colors.I hand-drawn them so my expectations are not really high but it turned out better then i expected it to be.And i also painted my nails with the same shape but its meh i think.I am planing to do a embroidery on my shirt with the same symol as soon as i find the right type of floss.So sorry for quality my phones cam is broken:((I hope you like it. Stay safe,take care lt;33. My Flight Rising account:[https://flightrising.com/main.php?p=lair amp;tab=userpage amp;id=544570](https://flightrising.com/main.php?p=lair amp;tab=userpage amp;id=544570) #8203; https://preview.redd.it/30oaozwir4r51.png?width=564 amp;format=png amp;auto=webp amp;s=deb98a450187a55da62ada9245ec22ee524c7836
